channel.description: Recent content in semanticsearch on Bodacious Blog

item.title: OpenAI API for NLP
item.description: Related articles I’d like to add some OpenAI support to emacs. Emacs Websockets // Bodacious Blog API Apply the API to any language task semantic search, summarization, sentiment analysis, content generation, translation, and more… Use only a few examples or by specifying your task in English. Semantic search 1 2 3 4 5 6 Semantic Search [openai-api] Allows searching over documents based on the natural-language meaning of queries rather than keyword matching.
